content.data:
[Y]Cover Tape Dream
[W]A fantasy issue stuffed with goodies.
[c][m.]
[W]Imagine one tape with a game, an art
[W]tool and a utility that saves your
[W]week.
[W]Budget labels proved tiny teams can
[W]produce huge joy with tiny memory.
[c][m.]
[G]- One arcade game.
[G]- One coding utility.
[G]- One printable cheat sheet.
[m][m-]
[Y]NEXT MONTH
[C]Write in if you want a type-in game
[C]special.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
